verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> came בִשְׁמוֹנִ֣ים <S%H8084><s%> and eightieth שָׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year וְאַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> And it came to pass in the four מֵא֣וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֡ה <S%H8141><s%> year לְצֵ֣את <S%H3318><s%> were come out בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> after the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִצְרַיִם֩ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt בַּשָּׁנָ֨ה <S%H8141><s%> year הָרְבִיעִ֜ית <S%H7243><s%> in the fourth בְּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> in the month זִ֗ו <S%H2099><s%> Zif ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> which הַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> which [is] the second לִמְלֹ֥ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reign שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> of Solomon's עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> over Israel וַיִּ֥בֶן <S%H1129><s%> that he began to build הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> the house לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְהַבַּ֗יִת <S%H1004><s%> And the house אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which בָּנָ֜ה <S%H1129><s%> built הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> which king שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <S%H8010><s%> Solomon לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD שִׁשִּֽׁים־ <S%H8346><s%> thereof [was] threescore אַמָּ֥ה <S%H520><s%> cubits אָרְכּ֖וֹ <S%H753><s%> the length וְעֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> thereof twenty רָחְבּ֑וֹ <S%H7341><s%> and the breadth וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> thereof thirty אַמָּ֖ה <S%H520><s%> cubits קוֹמָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6967><s%> [cubits] and the height

וְהָאוּלָ֗ם <S%H197><s%> And the porch עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> along פְּנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> before הֵיכַ֣ל <S%H1964><s%> the temple הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty אַמָּה֙ <S%H520><s%> cubits אָרְכּ֔וֹ <S%H753><s%> [was] the length עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> along פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> the front רֹ֣חַב <S%H7341><s%> thereof according to the breadth הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house עֶ֧שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> [and] ten בָּאַמָּ֛ה <S%H520><s%> cubits רָחְבּ֖וֹ <S%H7341><s%> [was] the breadth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> along פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> the front הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> thereof before the house
וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> he made לַבָּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> And for the house חַלּוֹנֵ֖י <S%H2474><s%> windows שְׁקֻפִ֥ים <S%H8261><s%> lights אֲטֻמִֽים׃ <S%H331><s%> of narrow

וַיִּבֶן֩ <S%H1129><s%> he built עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Against קִ֨יר <S%H7023><s%> And against the wall הַבַּ֤יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house [יָצֹועַ כ] (יָצִ֙יעַ֙ <S%H3326><s%> bed ק) סָבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> round about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קִיר֤וֹת <S%H7023><s%> [against] the walls הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> of the house סָבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> round about לַֽהֵיכָ֖ל <S%H1964><s%> [both] of the temple וְלַדְּבִ֑יר <S%H1687><s%> and of the oracle וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and he made צְלָע֖וֹת <S%H6763><s%> chambers סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about

[הַיָּצֹועַ כ] (הַיָּצִ֨יעַ <S%H3326><s%> bed ק) הַתַּחְתֹּנָ֜ה <S%H8481><s%> The nethermost חָמֵ֧שׁ <S%H2568><s%> [was] five בָּאַמָּ֣ה <S%H520><s%> cubits רָחְבָּ֗הּ <S%H7341><s%> broad וְהַתִּֽיכֹנָה֙ <S%H8484><s%> and the middle שֵׁ֤שׁ <S%H8337><s%> [was] six בָּֽאַמָּה֙ <S%H520><s%> cubits רָחְבָּ֔הּ <S%H7341><s%> broad וְהַ֨שְּׁלִישִׁ֔ית <S%H7992><s%> and the third שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7651><s%> [was] seven בָּאַמָּ֖ה <S%H520><s%> cubits רָחְבָּ֑הּ <S%H7341><s%> broad כִּ֡י <S%H3588><s%> for מִגְרָעוֹת֩ <S%H4052><s%> narrowed rests נָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> he made לַבַּ֤יִת <S%H1004><s%> the house סָבִיב֙ <S%H5439><s%> round about ח֔וּצָה <S%H2351><s%> for without [in the wall] of לְבִלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> because אֲחֹ֥ז <S%H270><s%> that [the beams] should not be fastened בְּקִֽירוֹת־ <S%H7023><s%> in the walls הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> of the house

וְהַבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> And the house בְּהִבָּ֣נֹת֔וֹ <S%H1129><s%> when it was in building אֶֽבֶן־ <S%H68><s%> of stone שְׁלֵמָ֥ה <S%H8003><s%> made ready מַסָּ֖ע <S%H4551><s%> before it was brought נִבְנָ֑ה <S%H1129><s%> was built וּמַקָּב֤וֹת <S%H4717><s%> thither so that there was neither hammer וְהַגַּרְזֶן֙ <S%H1631><s%> nor axe כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any כְּלִ֣י <S%H3627><s%> [nor] any tool בַרְזֶ֔ל <S%H1270><s%> of iron לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> neither נִשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> heard בַּבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> in the house בְּהִבָּנֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1129><s%> while it was in building

פֶּ֗תַח <S%H6607><s%> The door הַצֵּלָע֙ <S%H6763><s%> chamber הַתִּ֣יכֹנָ֔ה <S%H8484><s%> for the middle אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about כֶּ֥תֶף <S%H3802><s%> side הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house הַיְמָנִ֑ית <S%H3233><s%> [was] in the right וּבְלוּלִּ֗ים <S%H3883><s%> with winding stairs יַֽעֲלוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> and they went up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto הַתִּ֣יכֹנָ֔ה <S%H8484><s%> into the middle וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַתִּֽיכֹנָ֖ה <S%H8484><s%> [chamber] and out of the middle אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַשְּׁלִשִֽׁים׃ <S%H7992><s%> into the third

וַיִּ֥בֶן <S%H1129><s%> So he built אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> the house וַיְכַלֵּ֑הוּ <S%H3615><s%> and finished וַיִּסְפֹּ֤ן <S%H5603><s%> it and covered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> the house גֵּבִ֔ים <S%H1356><s%> with beams וּשְׂדֵרֹ֖ת <S%H7713><s%> and boards בָּאֲרָזִֽים׃ <S%H729><s%> made of cedar

וַיִּ֤בֶן <S%H1129><s%> And [then] he built אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> [הַיָּצֹועַ כ] (הַיָּצִ֙יעַ֙ <S%H3326><s%> bed ק) עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> against all the house חָמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> five אַמּ֖וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits קֽוֹמָת֑וֹ <S%H6967><s%> high וַיֶּאֱחֹ֥ז <S%H270><s%> and they rested אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> on the house בַּעֲצֵ֥י <S%H6086><s%> [with] timber אֲרָזִֽים׃ <S%H730><s%> of cedar פ
וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> And the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> came to Solomon לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

הַבַּ֨יִת <S%H1004><s%> [Concerning] this house הַזֶּ֜ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you בֹנֶ֗ה <S%H1129><s%> which thou art in building אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if תֵּלֵ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> will walk בְּחֻקֹּתַי֙ <S%H2708><s%> in my statutes וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁפָּטַ֣י <S%H4941><s%> my judgments תַּֽעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> and execute וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֥ <S%H8104><s%> and keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִצְוֹתַ֖י <S%H4687><s%> all my commandments לָלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> walking בָּהֶ֑ם וַהֲקִמֹתִ֤י <S%H6965><s%> in them then will I perform אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָרִי֙ <S%H1697><s%> my word אִתָּ֔ךְ <S%H854><s%> for אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> with thee which I spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> unto David אָבִֽיךָ׃ <S%H1><s%> thy father

וְשָׁ֣כַנְתִּ֔י <S%H7931><s%> And I will dwell בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and will not אֶעֱזֹ֖ב <S%H5800><s%> and will not forsake אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> my people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel ס
וַיִּ֧בֶן <S%H1129><s%> built שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <S%H8010><s%> So Solomon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> the house וַיְכַלֵּֽהוּ׃ <S%H3615><s%> and finished

וַיִּבֶן֩ <S%H1129><s%> And he built אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קִיר֨וֹת <S%H7023><s%> the walls הַבַּ֤יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house מִבַּ֙יְתָה֙ <S%H1004><s%> within בְּצַלְע֣וֹת <S%H6763><s%> with boards אֲרָזִ֔ים <S%H730><s%> of cedar מִקַּרְקַ֤ע <S%H7172><s%> both the floor הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> of the house עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against קִיר֣וֹת <S%H7023><s%> and the walls הַסִּפֻּ֔ן <S%H5604><s%> of the cieling צִפָּ֥ה <S%H6823><s%> [and] he covered עֵ֖ץ <S%H6086><s%> with wood מִבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> [them] on the inside וַיְצַ֛ף <S%H6823><s%> and covered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קַרְקַ֥ע <S%H7172><s%> the floor הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house בְּצַלְע֥וֹת <S%H6763><s%> with planks בְּרוֹשִֽׁים׃ <S%H1265><s%> of fir

וַיִּבֶן֩ <S%H1129><s%> And he built אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty אַמָּ֜ה <S%H520><s%> cubits [מִיַּרְכֹּותֵי כ] (מִֽיַּרְכְּתֵ֤י <S%H3411><s%> border ק) הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> of the house בְּצַלְע֣וֹת <S%H6763><s%> with boards אֲרָזִ֔ים <S%H730><s%> of cedar מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> both הַקַּרְקַ֖ע <S%H7172><s%> the floor עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הַקִּיר֑וֹת <S%H7023><s%> and the walls וַיִּ֤בֶן <S%H1129><s%> he even built לוֹ֙ מִבַּ֣יִת <S%H1004><s%> [them] for it within לִדְבִ֔יר <S%H1687><s%> [even] for the oracle לְקֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [even] for the most הַקֳּדָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H6944><s%> holy

וְאַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> it was forty בָּאַמָּ֖ה <S%H520><s%> cubits הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> And the house ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> that הַהֵיכָ֥ל <S%H1964><s%> that [is] the temple לִפְנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> front

וְאֶ֤רֶז <S%H730><s%> And the cedar אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> of the house פְּנִ֔ימָה <S%H6441><s%> within מִקְלַ֣עַת <S%H4734><s%> [was] carved פְּקָעִ֔ים <S%H6497><s%> with knops וּפְטוּרֵ֖י <S%H6358><s%> open צִצִּ֑ים <S%H6731><s%> flowers הַכֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֶ֔רֶז <S%H730><s%> all [was] cedar אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there אֶ֖בֶן <S%H68><s%> there was no stone נִרְאָֽה׃ <S%H7200><s%> seen

וּדְבִ֧יר <S%H1687><s%> And the oracle בְּתוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> in הַבַּ֛יִת <S%H1004><s%> the house מִפְּנִ֖ימָה <S%H6441><s%> within הֵכִ֑ין <S%H3559><s%> he prepared לְתִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> to set שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֖וֹן <S%H727><s%> there the ark בְּרִ֥ית <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְלִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> in the forepart הַדְּבִ֡יר <S%H1687><s%> And the oracle עֶשְׂרִים֩ <S%H6242><s%> [was] twenty אַמָּ֨ה <S%H520><s%> cubits אֹ֜רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> in length וְעֶשְׂרִ֧ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty אַמָּ֣ה <S%H520><s%> cubits רֹ֗חַב <S%H7341><s%> in breadth וְעֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty אַמָּה֙ <S%H520><s%> cubits קֽוֹמָת֔וֹ <S%H6967><s%> in the height וַיְצַפֵּ֖הוּ <S%H6823><s%> thereof and he overlaid זָהָ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> gold סָג֑וּר <S%H5462><s%> it with pure וַיְצַ֥ף <S%H6823><s%> and [so] covered מִזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> the altar אָֽרֶז׃ <S%H730><s%> [which was of] cedar

וַיְצַ֨ף <S%H6823><s%> overlaid שְׁלֹמֹ֧ה <S%H8010><s%> So Solomon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבַּ֛יִת <S%H1004><s%> the house מִפְּנִ֖ימָה <S%H6441><s%> within זָהָ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> gold סָג֑וּר <S%H5462><s%> with pure וַיְעַבֵּ֞ר <S%H5674><s%> and he made a partition [בְּרַתִּיקֹות כ] (בְּרַתּוּקֹ֤ות <S%H7572><s%> chain ק) זָהָב֙ <S%H2091><s%> of gold לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before הַדְּבִ֔יר <S%H1687><s%> the oracle וַיְצַפֵּ֖הוּ <S%H6823><s%> and he overlaid זָהָֽב׃ <S%H2091><s%> it with gold
